H0.text: The Scottish football club Ferranti Thistle joined the Scottish Football League in 1974 as Meadowbank Thistle; in 1995 they relocated and changed their name to what. Edinburgh City

H1.text: The Scottish football club Ferranti Thistle joined the Scottish Football League in 1974 as Meadowbank Thistle; in 1995 they relocated and changed their name to what. Alloa Athletic

H2.text: The Scottish football club Ferranti Thistle joined the Scottish Football League in 1974 as Meadowbank Thistle; in 1995 they relocated and changed their name to what. Airdrieonians

H3.text: The Scottish football club Ferranti Thistle joined the Scottish Football League in 1974 as Meadowbank Thistle; in 1995 they relocated and changed their name to what. Livingston

A4.text: In 1995, the club was relocated to Livingston, West Lothian and renamed after the town.

A5.text: Since then Livingston have played their home games at Almondvale Stadium.
